name: Gogglebox: The Game – 100 Puzzlebox Street
description:
Welcome to 100 Puzzlebox Street, the home of the official game of the British TV hit!

Make your way through the Gogglebox streets that feature a selection of the popular Gogglebox stars from some of Britain’s most opinionated households. Play through levels and earn stars to unlock new challenges and classic Gogglebox scenes.

Like the families you can play in the comforts of your own home, switching and matching your way through the streets of England to conquer the 100 levels as well as 6 thrilling game modes. Put your slippers on and boil the kettle because Gogglebox: The Game has plenty of entertainment on offer to keep you on the edge of your sofa!

Unlock your favourite families as you progress through the game, including:

• The Moffats
• Sandy & Sandra
• Stephen & Chris
• Giles & Mary
• Jenny & Lee
• Leon & June

Key features:

• Collect Stars to advance along the Gogglebox street
• Animations of your favourite Gogglebox scenes to unlock
• Boosters to help with tricky levels
• Master 6 exciting game modes
• One Hundred levels
• Leaderboards to view and compete with friends
• Link your progress across devices when you log in with Facebook


*Please note – this game is free to play, however some items may be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

Gogglebox fan? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

https://www.facebook.com/All-4-Games-1529943653963267/

@All_4_Games

Please note - Just like Gogglebox on Channel 4, the families occasionally swear which is why the game has a 17+ rating.

In order to deliver a personalised, responsive service and to improve the game, we remember and store information about how you use it. The information is completely anonymous and will never include any personal details. It is used only by Channel 4 or the trusted partners we work with. If you wish, you can switch off our analytics software within the “Options” screen of the game. The game contains promotions for Channel 4’s other products and services as well as some promotions of third party products and services. By downloading this application, you agree to our terms of use

(http://www.channel4.com/programmes/all-4-games/articles/all/game-terms-and-conditions/3984), privacy policy and cookies policy.
